Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2010 12:44AM FireCat wrote: Hi Lisasinglem, I'm new to these forums, but having just had my lumpectomy on 6/29, I had to offer my support.  I know waiting for the final path report seemed to me to be the hardest part! (I got final results on the same day you had surgery...all is good).  I am healing quickly, drinking lots of water, icing the area when needed (my nerves from the SNB are coming back and they aren't happy).  Kira1234 is quite right, be good to yourself. Support is also a good healing agent, and you have lots of that!
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy today lisasinglem lisasinglem
